page.title: 08INDUSTRY THRUPP STROUD
page.content: { {DANARM}- Distributors of chain saws,hedge trimmers and brush cutters from Japan.Originally manufacturers of chain saws from 1942 to 1984.18 employed.{CARPETS OF WORTH}- Yarn is spun from fleeces for Axminster carpets which are made at Stourport. Owned by Arab consortium.Overseas market accounts for 75 per cent of sales.130 employees in 3 shifts.Ear protectors worn -some machine noise is 90dB compared with Concorde's 110dB. {BATRICAR}- make electric mobility models for disabled,handicapped and also for industry.The firm started in 1964 and now employs 92.They have distribution centres in Florida,West Germany,Australia,South Africa and New Zealand.
